description:
Non-material amendment related to planning permission P2017/5015/FUL for the demolition of existing 4th floor and removal of the associated rooftop plant and erection of a replacement extension providing two floors of additional B1(a) office floorspace (362 sqm) via a facsimile 4th floor and set back 5th floor level. Consolidation of plant within a setback roof level enclosure and other associated alterations to the external elevations of the building (granted 26/06/2018).

The amendments involve the following 
* Retention of existing lift core to provide 8 person lift and new core layout 
* Insertion of 8 no . 500 x 500 grilles (matching colour to existing building) on Northern elevation 
* Insertion of smaller sized window on southern elevation (ground floor) matching style of first floor windows 
* Basement layout altered to allow retention of existing lift core and stairs (maintaining services - refuse, cycle and refuse storage
*Ground floor slab retained with ramp added to ensure inclusive access
*Existing first floor raised section in north-west corner to be retained
decision_conditions: You are reminded that the non-material amendments agreed must be read in conjunction with the original planning permission P2017/5015/FUL and the conditions which were imposed on the original planning permission are still valid.
